dmca.title: born-again-christian.info complains of infringement
dmca.body:
DMCA Complaint of Copyright Violation by Rev. [private]

I, [private], am the sole owner of the website
born-again-christian.info, which has had original copyright material,
authored by me, taken from it without permission and posted on webpages
listed in Google.com. Please remove all the infringing pages from your
index immediately, and kindly reply to:

[private]@born-again-christian.info

Confirming your compliance with our request in accordance with DMCA
1998.

Here follow details of the infringement:

The copyrighted work at issue is the copyright text that appears on our
website at:

http://wigglesworth.born-again-christian.info/smith.wigglesworth.sermons.pentecostal.htm

The Infringer's website is: http://glorytotheking.proboards32.com

The infringing page can be found in Google using search terms: rev. jack
howell wigglesworth.

It appears here:

Peace In Jesus Bible Discussion Forum - Smith Wigglesworth

http://glorytotheking.proboards32.com/index.cgi?board=cults&action=display&thread=1122851934
and
http://glorytotheking.proboards32.com/index.cgi?board=cults&action=print&thread=1122851934

On the first page of this thread (post 7) the Infringer has copied and
posted our biography of Smith Wigglesworth illegally. Permission to use
our copyright text was neither sought, nor granted. This violates both
International Copyright Law and US Federal Law.

Infringer: Rev. [private] [private]@hotmail.com

Statutory Declaration:

I, [private], have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted
materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I declare*, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

*NOTE: I am a Christian missionary, God's Word specifically commands me
NOT to swear, just let your yes be yes. (Holy Bible, James 5:12; 'But
above all things, my brethren, swear not, neither by heaven, neither by
the earth, neither by any other oath: but let your yea be yea; and your
nay, nay; lest ye fall into condemnation.') Therefore I don't swear
anything, I simply declare the above to be true.

SIGNED: [private]
DATE: 18th August 2005
